title: Online Transfers & Instant Payments

sections.title: Transfer Vocabulary
sections.content:
Sending money digitally is fast and easy.

- **Send**: Mandar / Enviar dinero.
- **Receive**: Recibir dinero.
- **Recipient / Payee**: The person who receives the money.
- **Instant Transfer**: Money that arrives in seconds.
- **Standard Transfer**: Money that arrives in 1-2 days.
- **Reference**: A short note for the payment (e.g., 'Rent').

sections.title: When is the money arriving?
sections.content:
Use prepositions of time to talk about transfers:

- The money arrives **at** 5:00 PM.
- Send the payment **on** Monday.
- The transfer is completed **in** 10 minutes.
- **Instant**: Right now / immediately.
